field.name: width_type
field.label: Set width type
field.description: Set the type of width of template, pixel (px) or percent (%)

field.name: width
field.label: Web site width
field.description: Enter the width for your Website. if Width type is Pixel (px) then (Example: 1000, 900... ). if width type is Percent (%) then (Example: 100, 95, 90... )

field.name: width_right
field.label: Width of right column
field.description: Enter the width for Right column. if Width type is Pixel (px) then (Example: 300, 200... ). if width type is Percent (%) then (Example: 30, 20... )

field.name: color_text
field.label: Color for text
field.description: Please select the color for your body in content that you would like to display. Default : #747474

field.name: color_links
field.label: Color for links
field.description: Please select the color for your links in content that you would like to display. Default : #883727

field.name: fontSize
field.label: Default font size
field.description: Set the default font size when template is loaded for the first time
